for kjds in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    if n % 2 == 1:
        print(-1)
        continue
    for g in range(1, n + 1):
        l.append(g)
    a = 0
    for f in range(n // 2):
        temp = l[a]
        l[a] = l[a + 1]
        l[a + 1] = temp
        a += 2
    print(*l)

testcases = int(input())
for eachcase in range(testcases):
    length = int(input())
    if length & 1:
        print(-1)
    else:
        nums = [i for i in range(1, length + 1)]
        total = sum(nums)
        index = length - 1
        pause = length - 1
        while index >= 0 and pause >= 2:
            if (total - nums[index]) % pause != 0:
                (nums[index], nums[pause]) = (nums[pause], nums[index])
                total -= nums[pause]
                index = pause
                pause -= 1
            index -= 1
        print(*nums)

case = int(input())
for _ in range(case):
    n = int(input())
    if n & 1 == 1:
        print(-1)
        continue
    print(1, 2, end=' ')
    i = 3
    while i < n:
        print(i + 1, i, end=' ')
        i += 2
    print()

ans = []
nq = int(input())
for _ in range(nq):
    n = int(input())
    if n & 1:
        val = '-1'
    else:
        a = []
        i = n
        while i > 0:
            a.append(str(i - 1))
            a.append(str(i))
            i += -2
        val = ' '.join(a)
    ans.append(val)
print(*ans, sep='\n')

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    summ = n * (n + 1) // 2
    if summ % n == 0:
        print(-1)
        continue
    i = 2
    ans = [1, 2]
    summ = 3
    while i < n:
        if summ % (i + 1) == 0:
            ans.append(i + 2)
            ans.append(i + 1)
            summ += i + i + 3
            i += 2
        else:
            ans.append(i + 1)
            summ += i + 1
            i += 1
    print(*ans)
